mapper.select: select * from chunk where section_no = ${section_no} ORDER BY no DESC
mapper.insert: insert into chunk(link, title, thumbnail, section_no, user_no, regdate, description, link_title, link_description) values (#{link}, #{title}, #{thumbnail}, ${section_no}, ${user_no}, #{regdate}, #{description}, #{link_title}, #{link_description})
mapper.update: update chunk set link=#{link}, title=#{title}, thumbnail=#{thumbnail}, description=#{description}, link_title=#{link_title}, link_description=#{link_description} where no = ${no}
